code: @Manual{,   title = {PrettyCols: Pretty Colour Palettes},   author = {Nicola Rennie},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 1.0.0.9000},   url = {https://nrennie.github.io/PrettyCols/}, }

title: Pretty Colour Palettes
text: {PrettyCols} R package containing aesthetically pleasing colour palettes. structure package based code {PNWColors}, {wesanderson}, {MetBrewer} packages.

title: Pretty Colour Palettes
text: {PrettyCols} available CRAN. Install using: install development version GitHub: See nrennie.github.io/PrettyCols full documentation.

title: Complete list of palettes. — PrettyColsPalettes
text: Use names(PrettyColsPalettes) return palette names.

title: Generates the colour palettes — prettycols
text: Generates colour palettes

title: Generates the colour palettes — prettycols
Generates the colour palettes — prettycols
text: name Name Palette. Run names(PrettyColsPalettes) view options. n Number desired colors. number requested colors beyond scope palette, colors automatically interpolated. n provided, length palette used. type Either "continuous" "discrete". Use continuous want automatically interpolate colors. Default "discrete" direction Sets order colors. Default palette 1. direction -1, palette color order reversed

title: Generates the colour palettes — prettycols
text: character vector hex colour codes.

title: Generates the colour palettes — prettycols

what: Plotting with PrettyCols palettes for colour ggplot2 — scale_color_pretty_c
title: Plotting with PrettyCols palettes for colour ggplot2 — scale_color_pretty_c
text: Plotting PrettyCols palettes colour ggplot2

title: Plotting with PrettyCols palettes for colour ggplot2 — scale_color_pretty_c
Plotting with PrettyCols palettes for colour ggplot2 — scale_color_pretty_c
text: name Name Palette. Run names(PrettyColsPalettes) view options. direction Sets order colors. Default palette 1. direction -1, palette color order reversed legend_title Character string specifying legend title. Default NULL. ... arguments passed scale_color_gradientn

title: Plotting with PrettyCols palettes for colour ggplot2 — scale_color_pretty_c
text: ggproto object defining continuous colour scale use ggplot2.

title: Plotting with PrettyCols palettes for colour ggplot2 — scale_color_pretty_c
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(data=iris, aes(x=Petal.Width, y=Petal.Length, color=Petal.Width)) +   geom_point() +   scale_color_pretty_c("Tangerines")

what: Prints all available colour palettes — view_all_palettes
title: Prints all available colour palettes — view_all_palettes
text: Prints available colour palettes

title: Prints all available colour palettes — view_all_palettes
Prints all available colour palettes — view_all_palettes
text: type Type colour palettes view. Either palettes, sequential palettes, diverging palettes, qualitative palettes. Types must least one c("", "seq", "div", "qual"). Default "". colourblind_friendly Boolean whether return colourblind friendly palettes. Default FALSE.

title: Prints all available colour palettes — view_all_palettes
text: plot colour palettes available package.

title: Prints all available colour palettes — view_all_palettes
code: view_all_palettes(type = "seq")  view_all_palettes(type = c("seq", "div"))  view_all_palettes(type = "div", colourblind_friendly = TRUE)

title: PrettyCols 1.0.0.9000 2022_09_18
text: Add new palettes: Beach, Fun Allow multiple selection palettes Filter colourblind friendly palettes Add legend_title argument scale functions Update tests vignettes informative error messages

title: PrettyCols 1.0.0 2022_08_28
text: CRAN release: 2022-08-31 first CRAN submission use CC0 license remove complementary_color() add examples documentation

title: PrettyCols 0.0.7 2022_08_27
text: add view_all_palettes() function add Autumn, Winter, Rainbow, Teals TealGreens palettes update vignettes edit layout print function slightly add basic tests using {testthat}

title: PrettyCols 0.0.6 2022_08_21
text: update linting update GitHub Actions Add Relax palette

title: PrettyCols 0.0.5 2022_05_21
text: update pkgdown site

title: PrettyCols 0.0.4 2022_05_21
text: add new palettes add R CMD checks

title: PrettyCols 0.0.3 2022_05_14
text: add new palettes add vignettes add function finding complementary colour

title: PrettyCols 0.0.2 2022_05_07
text: update license

title: PrettyCols 0.0.1 2022_03_25
text: initial package add MoodyBlues palette
